extDesc.description: Localized extension description - MUST be under 130 chars
extDesc.message: Our extension provides real-time Yahoo Mail alerts & one-click access to your inbox. It also sets your search and tabs to Yahoo.

mailNotify_FirstRunMessage.description: Message found in the first run notification
mailNotify_FirstRunMessage.message: One click access to your inbox so you can search, surf and scan mail with ease

mailNotify_FirstRunTitle.description: Title found in the first run notification

mailNotify_NotifyMsgXSpecific.description: Notification for X new mail from Y person

mailNotify_OptionsNotifyFalse.message: I don't want to see notifications

mailNotify_OptionsSaved.description: Text shown after an option is selected by the user

mailNotify_TooltipLoggedIn.description: Tooltip shown on the browserAction icon when user is logged in

mailNotify_TooltipLoggedOut.description: Tooltip shown on the browserAction icon when user is logged out
mailNotify_TooltipLoggedOut.message: Click here to sign in to Yahoo

pageParams.description: Localized in page parameters used for new tab page + tracking - dev will translate, not localizers

srchProvDomain.description: Localized search provider domain - dev will translate, not localizers

srchProvName.description: Localized search provider name- must not collide with built-in names for Y! SP, which is why we used 'Yahoo Web' in English.

srchProvPath.description: Localized search provider path - dev will translate, not localizers

srchSuggDomain.description: Localized search suggestion domain - dev will translate, not localizers

srchSuggPath.description: Localized search suggestion URL path - dev will translate, not localizers

supercharged.message: The Yahoo Extension is making this page faster
